block.p: BASEBALL American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES -- Placed 3B Ryan Minor on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 5. Recalled INF Ivanon Coffie from Bowie of the Eastern League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased the contract of RHP Jaime Navarro from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned RHP Sean DePaula to Buffalo. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Purchased the contract of 1B Doug Jennings from Long Island of the Atlantic League and assigned him to Omaha of the PCL. National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed SS Orlando Cabrera on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled SS Tomas De La Rosa from Ottawa of the International League.

FOOTBALL National Football League DETROIT LIONS--Signed G Stockar McDougle to a five-year contract and WR Alonzo Johnson. Announced the retirement of WR Tim Alexander. Released PK Pete Garces. NEW YORK JETS--Signed DE Anthony Cook. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Agreed to terms with WR Todd Pinkston on a five-year contract.

HOCKEY National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Signed LW Marian Gaborik to a three-year contract. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Agreed to terms with D Andrei Markov. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed D Ossi Vaananen to a multiyear contract. United Hockey League ADIRONDACK ICEHAWKS--Signed C Kevin St. Jacques.

COLLEGE BENEDICT--Named Cedric Baker women's basketball coach. FRANCIS MARION--Named Todd Gober volleyball coach. NEW MEXICO--Approved a two-year contract extension for Lou Henson, men's basketball coach, through the 2003-04 season.
